title: GQP Goes After Disney, Night Light = Health Hazard? 4.04.22
itunes:title: GQP Goes After Disney, Night Light = Health Hazard? 4.04.22
description:
In episode 1218, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian and co-host of Here's the Scenario, Mike Feeney to discuss All QAnon everything…, Speaking of tired old talking points…IVERMECTIN, Having just a little bit of light can have health effects?, Dyson made headphones that are also an air purifier and more!

  1. All QAnon everything…
  2. Speaking of tired old talking points…IVERMECTIN
  3. Having just a little bit of light can have health effects?
  4. Dyson made headphones that are also an air purifier…
  5. Dyson headphones come with air vacuum for mouth
  6. In the Zone: Dyson's First Wireless Headphones Pump Fresh Tunes to Your Ears and Fresh Air to Your Face
  7. Dyson denies air-purifying headphones are an April Fool's prank

Mike Feeney's Comedy Album: Rage Against the Routine

For Mike's Tour Dates: mikefeeneycomedy.com/

LISTEN: Eagle Energy by Sango

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
